overview: The animation on the theme “Calendar” is dedicated to the memorable date - April 25, which marks World Malaria Day. All actions take place in the ring, where a Person endlessly fights a Mosquito. The video includes 3 main images-symbols: A person acts as a symbol of humanity, a mosquito as a symbol of malaria, boxing as a symbol of struggle. The purpose of the animation is to draw attention to the fact that the fight against the disease is still going on.
title: World Malaria Day
